author: Rappler.com
title: Ronnie Dayan arrested in Pangasinan
text:
Philippines Ronnie Dayan arrested in Pangasinan Dayan is accused of collecting money from drug personalities at the New Bilibid Prison in behalf of De Lima Published 12:08 AM, February 24, 2017 Updated 12:08 AM, February 24, 2017 ARRESTED. Ronnie Dayan at a press conference at the House of Representatives in November 2016. File photo by Joel Liporada/Rappler 
  Ronnie Dayan, the former lover and alleged bagman of Senator Leila de Lima, was arrested in Urbiztondo, Pangasinan on Thursday evening, February 23. 
Judge Juanita Guerrero of Muntinlupa Regional Trial Court Branch 204 earlier issued an arrest warrant for De Lima, Dayan, and former Bureau of Corrections chief Rafael Ragos over the drug trade inside the New Bilibid Prison. 
An Inquirer report said Dayan was captured around 7 pm in his house, and he did not resist arrest. 
"Dayan said he expected the arrest because he saw it on TV earlier today," Chief Inspector Joshua Maximo, Urbiztondo police chief, was quoted as saying in the report. 
Dayan is accused of collecting money from drug personalities at the New Bilibid Prison in behalf of De Lima. 
He was also previously arrested in San Juan, La Union last November after he failed to attend a House probe into the Bilibid drug trade, then later released. 
The police, meanwhile, have given De Lima until 10 am on Friday, February 24, before serving the warrant of arrest against her.
